title: The Exchange: Anshu Jain
description:
Deutsche Bank was credited with coming through the 2008 crisis in better shape than many of its rivals. Jain, who rose from running the German lender’s global markets business to eventually become CEO, stopped by Times Square to speak with Rob Cox about the state of finance.   See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
